mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs James W. Duncan
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs James W. Duncan Offense: Assault and Beat Victim: Millard T. Burton Complainant: James W. Bishop Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 12.04.1887 Guilty, Fine: $2.50 Court cost: $1.01 With fine and costs paid, defendant discharged from further prosecution
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
